title: MG Chemicals - 4140-400G 4140 Flux Remover for PC Boards, 400g (14 Oz) Aerosol Can
features: Use when a general-purpose flux remover is required
Suitable for use with rosin, non-rosin, and no clean fluxes
A special blend of ethyl alcohol, isopropanol and ethyl acetate
description: The 4140 Flux Remover for PC Boards is a blend of ethyl alcohol, isopropanol, and ethyl acetate that is an dry cleaning solvent. It has a non-corrosive and non-conductive formulation with a moderate dry time.Since the 4140 is safe for most plastics and printed circuit board components, it is used heavily in the electronics industry. It is great for removing rosin, non-rosin, no-clean fluxes, and ionic contamination.
